text: Mazuwa matatu yeze yomboke Paulo awetangaga wakulu we Kiyahudi wa hant'hu aho weze waduganyike, Paulo niyo awaganba, â€œWaizilaeli wambuyazangu, hata uneva miye hidamanye chochose kiihile hekikuzumilana na want'huwetu hegu vihendo viya kihokele kulawa kwa wakale wetu, nehitendigwa kunda mvugailwa kudya Yelusalemu no kwink'hizwa kwa Walumi.
